verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2822>called<s%> to be an <S%G652>apostle<s%>, <S%G873>separated<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>,
which <S%G3739><s%> he promised <S%G4279>afore<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1124>scriptures<s%>,

concerning <S%G4012><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> was <S%G1096>born<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>,

who was <S%G3724>declared<s%> to be the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>, <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G42>holiness<s%>, <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead<s%>; even Jesus Christ our Lord,

through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G651>apostleship<s%>, <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%>, <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>'s sake;
among <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2822>called<s%> to be <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s:

To <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4516>Rome<s%>, <S%G27>beloved<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2822>called<s%> to be <S%G40>saints<s%>: <S%G5485>Grace<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

First <S%G4412><s%>, I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G2605>proclaimed<s%> <S%G1722>throughout<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3144>witness<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G3000>serve<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G5613>how<s%> <S%G89>unceasingly<s%> I <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3417>mention<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%>, always in my prayers

making <S%G1189>request<s%>, if by any <S%G1513>means<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> at <S%G4218>length<s%> I may be <S%G2137>prospered<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1971>long<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I may <S%G3330>impart<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G5486>gift<s%>, to the <S%G1519>end<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> may be <S%G4741>established<s%>;

that <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, that I <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> may be <S%G4837>comforted<s%> in <S%G1223>you<s%>, each of us by the <S%G240>other<s%>'s <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G5216>yours<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1700>mine<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G50>have<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G50>ignorant<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4178>oftentimes<s%> I <S%G4388>purposed<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G2532>(and<s%> was <S%G2967>hindered<s%> <S%G1204>hitherto<s%>), <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> in <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>.

I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3781>debtor<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> to <S%G915>Barbarians<s%>, <S%G2532>both<s%> to the <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> to the <S%G453>foolish<s%>.

So <S%G3779><s%>, as much as <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G2596>is<s%>, I am <S%G4289>ready<s%> to preach the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> that <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4516>Rome<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1870>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>: <S%G5547><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> to every <S%G3956>one<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G4100>believeth<s%>; to the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to the <S%G1672>Greek<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> therein1722, 846 <S%G601>is<s%> <S%G601>revealed<s%> a <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>: <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, But the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> shall <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2722>hinder<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%>;

because <S%G1360><s%> that which is <S%G1110>known<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5318>manifest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5318>manifested<s%> it unto <S%G846>them<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the invisible <S%G517>things<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G2937>creation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> are clearly <S%G2529>seen<s%>, being <S%G3539>perceived<s%> through the things that are <S%G4161>made<s%>, <S%G5037>even<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G126>everlasting<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2305>divinity<s%>; <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> may <S%G1511>be<s%> without <S%G379>excuse<s%>:

because <S%G1360>that<s%>, <S%G1097>knowing<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, they <S%G1392>glorified<s%> him <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2228>neither<s%> gave <S%G2168>thanks<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> became <S%G3154>vain<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1261>reasonings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G801>senseless<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> was <S%G4654>darkened<s%>.
Professing <S%G5335>themselves<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%>, they became <S%G3471>fools<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G236>changed<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G862>incorruptible<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>for<s%> the likeness of an <S%G1504>image<s%> <S%G3667>of<s%> <S%G5349>corruptible<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4071>birds<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5074>four-footed<s%> beasts, <S%G2532>and<s%> creeping <S%G2062>things<s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> God2316, 2532 <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3860>up<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness<s%>, that <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4983>bodies<s%> should be <S%G818>dishonored<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%>:

for that <S%G3748>they<s%> <S%G3337>exchanged<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>for<s%> a <S%G5579>lie<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4573>worshipped<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3000>served<s%> the <S%G2937>creature<s%> rather <S%G3844>than<s%> the <S%G2936>Creator<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2128>blessed<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.

and <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G730>men<s%>, <S%G863>leaving<s%> the <S%G5446>natural<s%> <S%G5540>use<s%> of the <S%G2338>woman<s%>, <S%G1572>burned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3715>lust<s%> one toward <S%G1519>another<s%>, <S%G240><s%> <S%G730>men<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G730>men<s%> <S%G2716>working<s%> <S%G808>unseemliness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G618>receiving<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> that <S%G489>recompense<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4106>error<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G1163>due<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> they1381, 3756 <S%G1381>refused<s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> their <S%G1922>knowledge<s%>, <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3860>up<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> a <S%G96>reprobate<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%>, to <S%G4160>do<s%> those <S%G3588>things<s%> which <S%G2520>are<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2520>fitting<s%>;

being filled <S%G4137>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%>, <S%G4202><s%> <S%G4189>wickedness<s%>, <S%G4124>covetousness<s%>, <S%G2549>maliciousness<s%>; <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G5355>envy<s%>, <S%G5408>murder<s%>, <S%G2054>strife<s%>, <S%G1388>deceit<s%>, <S%G2550>malignity<s%>; <S%G5588>whisperers<s%>,

backbiters <S%G2637><s%>, hateful to <S%G2319>God<s%>, <S%G5197>insolent<s%>, <S%G5244>haughty<s%>, <S%G213>boastful<s%>, <S%G2182>inventors<s%> of evil <S%G2556>things<s%>, <S%G545>disobedient<s%> to <S%G1118>parents<s%>,
without <S%G801>understanding<s%>, <S%G802>covenant-breakers<s%>, without natural <S%G794>affection<s%>, <S%G786><s%> <S%G415>unmerciful<s%>:

who <S%G3748><s%>, <S%G1921>knowing<s%> the <S%G1345>ordinance<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4238>practise<s%> such <S%G5108>things<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4909>consent<s%> with them <S%G3588>that<s%> practise <S%G4238>them<s%>.
